items.sentence: Nobody was interested in what Tom was saying.
Do you think Mary would go on a date with me?
Tom was just standing there, staring at Mary.
Three years ago, I went to Boston by bicycle.
Tom doesn't want to tell Mary how to do that.
My parents and I disagree on a lot of things.
Tom caught sight of Mary's face in the crowd.
I'm not as good-natured as people think I am.
This tastes really good. How did you make it?
Tom was skiing very fast before the accident.
It wasn't very polite of Tom to make us wait.
Tom fell down and skinned his knee on a rock.
Tom sends Mary a birthday present every year.
Tom said he wished that he hadn't gone there.
Tom said he was ready to do whatever it took.
Tom said he wished that you wouldn't do that.
Tom told Mary and me to go home by ourselves.
Tom told Mary and me to do that by ourselves.
Tom told Mary that he wouldn't do that again.
Tom thinks the sun revolves around the earth.
